Example.Name: USART_Printf_Example
Example.Description:
This example shows how to retarget the C library printf function to the USART. This implementation output the printf message on the Hyperterminal using USART1 (EVAL_COM1).
The USARTx is configured as follow: - BaudRate = 115200 baud - Word Length = 8 Bits - One Stop Bit - No parity - Hardware flow control disabled (RTS and CTS signals) - Receive and transmit enabled
